front.title: The Definitions of Managed Objects for the Link Control Protocol of the Point-to-Point Protocol
front.abstract: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it describes managed objects used for managing the Link Control Protocol and Link Quality Monitoring on subnetwork interfaces that use the family of Point-to-Point Protocols [8, 9, 10, 11, 12].
